title: Google Maps Business Scraper Input
description: Extract comprehensive business data from Google Maps including contact info, hours, reviews, and emails.

searchQueries.title: Search Queries
searchQueries.description: Enter search terms like 'coffee shops Taipei' or 'hotels near Taipei 101'

maxResults.title: Maximum Results
maxResults.description: Number of results per search. Recommended: 50-100 for best cost efficiency (max ~120)

language.title: Language
language.description: Interface language for better local results

scrapeDetails.title: Scrape Details
scrapeDetails.description: Get complete addresses, hours, and additional details (recommended)

scrapeEmails.title: Scrape Emails
scrapeEmails.description: Extract email addresses from business websites (slower but valuable for leads)

maxScrolls.title: Maximum Scrolls
maxScrolls.description: Scroll attempts to load more results. Higher = more results but slower

startUrls.title: Start URLs (Optional)
startUrls.description: Optional: Direct Google Maps URLs to scrape instead of search queries

useMultiSearch.title: Use Multi-Region Search
useMultiSearch.description: Enable multi-region search to get 100+ results by searching different areas

searchRegions.title: Search Regions
searchRegions.description: Additional regions to search (e.g., 'North', 'South', 'Downtown'). Leave empty for default regions.
